name: Drupal Sydney
tagline: Landing page for local Drupal community
body:
### Welcome to Drupal Sydney
This a mostly a landing page for now with links to the various services across the web that are used to connect the community. 

### Links
* [groups.drupal.org/Australia (GDO)](http://groups.drupal.org/australia)
* [Meetup (Main)](http://www.meetup.com/drupalsydney)
* [Meetup (Introduction)](http://www.meetup.com/Learning-Drupal-Sydney/)
* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/drupalsydney)
* [Videos](http://youtube.com/drupalsydney)
* [IRC (Real Time Chat)](irc://irc.freenode.net/drupal-au)
* [Slides (Slideshare)](http://is.gd/drupalsydney_slides)
* [Photos](http://flickr.com/groups/drupal-au)
* [Google Plus](http://gplus.to/drupalsydney)
* [Facebook Page](http://facebook.com/drupalsydney)
* [Facebook Group (Sydney)](http://www.facebook.com/groups/101268366635300/)
* [Facebook Group (Australia)](http://www.facebook.com/groups/235058543180182/)
* [LinkedIn](http://is.gd/drupalau_linkedin)


### TODO
* Put up community handbook
* Post details for feedback and how to get involved
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
